## R Markdown

```{r}
# install.packages("arules")

library(arules)
data <- read.csv(file = "AppleStoreClean.csv", head = TRUE)
tdata <- read.transactions("AppleStoreClean.csv", quote="")
```

## HCLUST

```{r}
distance = dist(as.matrix(data), method = "euclidean")

# perform clustering
hc = hclust(distance)

# cut the tree
clusterCut <- cutree(hc, 10)

# plot dendrogram
plot(clusterCut)
```

## Apriori

```{r}
apprules <- apriori(tdata, parameter = list(support = 0.005, confidence = 0.25))

summary(apprules)

inspect(sort(apprules, by = "confidence")[1:12])

#itemFrequencyPlot(tdata_all, topN = 10)
```
